39 // Class TriangleOverlapCallback
43 class TriangleOverlapCallback : public TriangleCallback {
44 
45  protected:
46 
47  const Ray& mRay;
48  ProxyShape* mProxyShape;
49  RaycastInfo& mRaycastInfo;
50  bool mIsHit;
51  decimal mSmallestHitFraction;
52  const HeightFieldShape& mHeightFieldShape;
53  MemoryAllocator& mAllocator;
54 
55 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
56 
58  Profiler* mProfiler;
59 
60 #endif
61 
62  public:
63 
64  // Constructor
65  TriangleOverlapCallback(const Ray& ray, ProxyShape* proxyShape, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo,
66  const HeightFieldShape& heightFieldShape, MemoryAllocator& allocator)
67  : mRay(ray), mProxyShape(proxyShape), mRaycastInfo(raycastInfo),
68  mHeightFieldShape (heightFieldShape), mAllocator(allocator) {
69  mIsHit = false;
70  mSmallestHitFraction = mRay.maxFraction;
71  }
72 
73  bool getIsHit() const {return mIsHit;}
74 
76  virtual void testTriangle(const Vector3* trianglePoints, const Vector3* verticesNormals, uint shapeId) override;
77 
78 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
79 
81  void setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) {
82  mProfiler = profiler;
83  }
84 
85 #endif
86 
87 };

90 // Class HeightFieldShape
101 class HeightFieldShape : public ConcaveShape {
102 
103  public:
104 
106  enum class HeightDataType {HEIGHT_FLOAT_TYPE, HEIGHT_DOUBLE_TYPE, HEIGHT_INT_TYPE};
107 
108  protected:
109 
110  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
111 
113  int mNbColumns;
114 
116  int mNbRows;
117 
119  decimal mWidth;
120 
122  decimal mLength;
123 
125  decimal mMinHeight;
126 
128  decimal mMaxHeight;
129 
131  int mUpAxis;
132 
134  decimal mIntegerHeightScale;
135 
137  HeightDataType mHeightDataType;
138 
140  const void* mHeightFieldData;
141 
143  AABB mAABB;
144 
146  const Vector3 mScaling;
147 
148  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
149 
151  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, ProxyShape* proxyShape, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
152 
154  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
155 
157  void initBVHTree();
158 
161  void getTriangleVerticesWithIndexPointer(int32 subPart, int32 triangleIndex,
162  Vector3* outTriangleVertices) const;
163 
165  int computeIntegerGridValue(decimal value) const;
166 
168  void computeMinMaxGridCoordinates(int* minCoords, int* maxCoords, const AABB& aabbToCollide) const;
169 
171  uint computeTriangleShapeId(uint iIndex, uint jIndex, uint secondTriangleIncrement) const;
172 
173  public:
174 
176  HeightFieldShape(int nbGridColumns, int nbGridRows, decimal minHeight, decimal maxHeight,
177  const void* heightFieldData, HeightDataType dataType,
178  int upAxis = 1, decimal integerHeightScale = 1.0f,
179  const Vector3& scaling = Vector3(1,1,1));
180 
182  virtual ~HeightFieldShape() override = default;
183 
185  HeightFieldShape(const HeightFieldShape& shape) = delete;
186 
188  HeightFieldShape& operator=(const HeightFieldShape& shape) = delete;
189 
191  const Vector3& getScaling() const;
192 
194  int getNbRows() const;
195 
197  int getNbColumns() const;
198 
200  Vector3 getVertexAt(int x, int y) const;
201 
203  decimal getHeightAt(int x, int y) const;
204 
206  HeightDataType getHeightDataType() const;
207 
209  virtual void getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const override;
210 
212  virtual void computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const override;
213 
215  virtual void testAllTriangles(TriangleCallback& callback, const AABB& localAABB) const override;
216 
218  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
219 
220  // ---------- Friendship ----------- //
221 
222  friend class ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback;
223  friend class ConcaveMeshRaycastCallback;
224 };

226 // Return the scaling factor
227 inline const Vector3& HeightFieldShape::getScaling() const {
228  return mScaling;
229 }

231 // Return the number of rows in the height field
232 inline int HeightFieldShape::getNbRows() const {
233  return mNbRows;
234 }

236 // Return the number of columns in the height field
237 inline int HeightFieldShape::getNbColumns() const {
238  return mNbColumns;
239 }

241 // Return the type of height value in the height field
242 inline HeightFieldShape::HeightDataType HeightFieldShape::getHeightDataType() const {
243  return mHeightDataType;
244 }
245 
246 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
247 inline size_t HeightFieldShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
248  return sizeof(HeightFieldShape);
249 }
250 
251 // Return the height of a given (x,y) point in the height field
252 inline decimal HeightFieldShape::getHeightAt(int x, int y) const {
253 
254  switch(mHeightDataType) {
255  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_FLOAT_TYPE : return ((float*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x];
256  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_DOUBLE_TYPE : return ((double*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x];
257  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_INT_TYPE : return ((int*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x] * mIntegerHeightScale;
258  default: assert(false); return 0;
259  }
260 }
261 
262 // Return the closest inside integer grid value of a given floating grid value
263 inline int HeightFieldShape::computeIntegerGridValue(decimal value) const {
264  return (value < decimal(0.0)) ? value - decimal(0.5) : value + decimal(0.5);
265 }
266 
267 // Return the local inertia tensor
273 inline void HeightFieldShape::computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const {
274 
275  // Default inertia tensor
276  // Note that this is not very realistic for a concave triangle mesh.
277  // However, in most cases, it will only be used static bodies and therefore,
278  // the inertia tensor is not used.
279  tensor.setAllValues(mass, 0, 0,
280  0, mass, 0,
281  0, 0, mass);
282 }
283 
284 // Compute the shape Id for a given triangle
285 inline uint HeightFieldShape::computeTriangleShapeId(uint iIndex, uint jIndex, uint secondTriangleIncrement) const {
286 
287  return (jIndex * (mNbColumns - 1) + iIndex) * 2 + secondTriangleIncrement;
288 }
289 
290 }
291 #endif
